title: ↪ 📱 AVENTURA: 2/2.5 Great Condo Unit, Excellent View, Super Price  On This
posting_body: ['REF# 11R96', '$5850 · 1544 Sqft · The Parc At Turnberry Isl · Aventura · 2/2.5 · Furnished', 'Call ➟ Text ➟ WhatsApp', "📲 786'*'5O5'*'4314", 'Carlos Manchego', 'Goldstein Realty', 'show contact info', 'GREAT CONDO UNIT, EXCELLENT VIEW, NICE VIEW FROM EVERY ROOM, BALCONY IN ALL THE BEDROOMS.', 'DEN WITH SOFA BED.', 'COMPLETLY FURNISHED.', 'OCEAN VIEW, MARINA AND INTRACOASTAL.', 'UPGRATED KITCHEN, GRANITE TOPS, STAIN STEEL APPLIANCES.', 'PRIVATE ELEVATOR, BEAUTIFUL COMMON AREAS.', 'CLOSE TO THE AVENTURA MALL, SHOPS, PARK AND RESTAURANTS.', 'REF# 11R96', 'tags:', 'marina blue, asia, three tequesta point, brickell vista, infinity at brickell, imperial at brickell, asia, 900 biscayne, three tequesta point, solaris at brickell, star lofts, three tequesta point, quantum on the bay, parc lofts, 1400 biscayne, water view, brickell shores, ios on the bay, residences at vizcaya, biscayne beach, viceroy, brickell, el portal homes, aria on the bay, wynwood lofts, one bayfront plaza, two midtown, direct bay view, furnished rentals, hyde midtown, wind by neo, 900 biscayne,, virginia pointe condo, four ambassadors', '_mr11']
